scripts.ai:start: npm run mcp:start && npm run ai:pull:deepseek
scripts.mcp:start: cd docker && docker-compose -f docker-compose.yml -f docker-compose.mcp.yml up -d
scripts.mcp:restart: npm run mcp:stop && npm run mcp:start
scripts.ai:pull:deepseek: docker exec -it botct-ollama ollama pull deepseek-r1:7b
scripts.ai:pull:llama: docker exec -it botct-ollama ollama pull llama3.2:3b
